titleStmt.title: An answer to a certain writing, entituled, Certain doubts and quaere's upon occasion of the late oath and covenant, with desire of satisfaction, for tender conscienced people, to whom it may be exhibited. 5. August. 1643 Imprimatur Joseph Caryl.
titleStmt.author: Hollingworth, Richard, 1607-1656.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Luke Fawne, and are to be sold at the signe of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Mr Hollingworth of Lancashire".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
